channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours
channel.description: RSS feed with direct links to popular technology articles. based on superdigg pipe

item.title: [+5721] Genius Husband of the Year [PIC]
item.description: She won't be dragging him along next time she goes shopping.

item.title: [+3294] Shit My Dad Says may be the best thing to come from Twitter
item.description: I'm 28. I live with my 73-year-old dad. He is awesome. I just write down shit that he says.

item.title: [+3034] The Pirate Bay Returns With Guns Blazing
item.description: After initially being taken offline by Swedish authorities, and after its first escape route failed, The Pirate Bay has returned with all guns blazing!

item.title: [+2346] UPS drops ALL Fox advertising, Not Just Glenn Beck!! Updated
item.description: Rich Hallabran, spokesman for UPS Stores, said today he has not only temporarily halted buying ads on the Glenn Beck Show but also on the Fox News Channel altogether as reported by AP Television writer David Bauder

item.title: [+1439] Have Faith in Jesus but Need Post-Rapture Pet-Care? [WTF]
item.description: "You've committed your life to Jesus. You know you're saved. But when the Rapture comes what's to become of your loving pets who are left behind? Eternal Earth-Bound Pets takes that burden off your mind."

item.title: [+1177] Dear Starbucks - A Funny Letter
item.description: A concerned patron of Starbucks writes a funny letter to the coffee giant about why you shouldn't place a mirror on the opposing wall of the toilet.

item.title: [+1113] Cat vs. Aquarium
item.description: He almost gets in every time.

item.title: [+1036] Federal Reserve loses suit demanding transparency
item.description: NEW YORK (Reuters) - A federal judge on Monday ruled against an effort by the U.S. Federal Reserve to block disclosure of companies that participated in and securities covered by a series of emergency

item.title: [+831] 15 Most Common Mistakes People Make when They're Drunk
item.description: Drinking alcohol is usually a good idea, but sometimes even the most reasonable of us drink too much and may find ourselves in compromising situations. Sometimes, the consequences amount to a slap on the hand -- other times, one can find him or herself faced with some jail time.

item.title: [+811] Piracy Is Not Theft - It's Piracy [COMIC]
[+746] The anti-Twitter: New site requires 1,400-character MINIMUM
item.description: For anyone who complains that Twitter posts are too short to be meaningful, we present you with Twitter's exact opposite: Woofer.

item.title: [+737] Super Epic Rainbow Cake (PIC)
item.description: OH SNAP! THIS CAKE IS CRAZY! Unicorn buttercream frosting. (Recipe via Whisk Kid)

item.title: [+697] If Everyone Had Their Own Magazine [PICS]
item.description: It seems like every special interest has it's own magazine, but there's also a niche group of people who the magazine industry could target. We decided to take it upon ourselves to create a few magazines covers and see what it would look like if every group of people really DID have their own magazine.
